title: pallANDu pallANDu vAzhgavE
sahitya:
pallANDu pallANDu vAzhgavE 
shuddhAnanda bhArati yOga samAjam jaya jaya


anupallavi

  kalviyum selvat-tozhilgaLum sezhikkak-kArvaLar kAvinaip-pOlE 
indap-pArvaLam OngiDap-paraman aruLAlE


caraNam    anbum aramum aruLum poruLuDan Anma nEya orumai kUDi inbamE 
shUzhndiDa ellArum vAzhndiDa engum mangaLa shakti pogip-polindiDavE
